rooms.name: Deluxe Garden View Room
rooms.description: Features private balcony with scenic garden views, elegant interiors with natural light, and premium bedding for ultimate comfort.
rooms.longDescription: Wake up to the sounds of nature and enjoy your morning coffee on your private balcony overlooking our beautifully manicured gardens. The Deluxe Garden View Room features elegant interiors with natural light, premium bedding for ultimate comfort, and modern amenities for a relaxing stay. Perfect for couples and solo travelers seeking a peaceful retreat amidst nature, this room combines contemporary design with traditional hospitality. The spacious layout and thoughtful amenities ensure every moment of your stay is comfortable and memorable, whether you're here for business or leisure.
features: Premium king-size bed with Egyptian cotton linens
En-suite marble bathroom with rainfall shower
Minibar with complimentary water and snacks

rooms.name: River View Suite
rooms.description: Spacious suite with panoramic views of the Rapti River, featuring private balcony and luxurious amenities for family stays.
rooms.longDescription: Nestled beside the Rapti River, this suite offers breathtaking panoramic views of the river and surrounding greenery. Perfect for families or groups seeking comfort and spectacular views, the River View Suite features a separate living area, two bedrooms, and luxurious amenities designed for memorable stays. The spacious layout includes a comfortable seating area perfect for family gatherings or enjoying the river view. With enhanced privacy and premium services, this suite ensures a truly relaxing experience in the heart of nature's beauty.
features: Spacious living area with river view
Two queen-size beds with premium bedding

rooms.name: Kerung Stream Villa
rooms.description: Luxury villa adjacent to Kerung Stream with private garden, two bathrooms, and immersive jungle surroundings.
rooms.longDescription: Experience ultimate privacy and luxury in our standalone villa adjacent to Kerung Stream. This villa features a private garden, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and immersive jungle surroundings for a truly unique stay. Perfect for families or groups seeking an exclusive jungle retreat surrounded by lush greenery, the Kerung Stream Villa offers complete seclusion with all modern comforts. The villa's design harmonizes with nature, featuring natural materials and large windows that bring the outdoors inside, creating a serene sanctuary for your vacation.
features: Two luxury bathrooms with premium amenities

rooms.name: Premium Jungle View Room
rooms.description: Room with breathtaking jungle canopy views, private balcony, and modern amenities for nature enthusiasts.
rooms.longDescription: Designed for nature enthusiasts, this premium room offers breathtaking views of the jungle canopy from your private balcony. Experience the authentic sights and sounds of the jungle while enjoying modern comforts and amenities. Perfect for bird watchers, nature lovers, and couples seeking a romantic jungle retreat, the Premium Jungle View Room provides an immersive experience with enhanced privacy. The room features premium soundproofing to ensure peaceful nights and special touches like binoculars and nature guides to enhance your jungle experience.
features: Private balcony with jungle canopy view
